game.name: Time Lock VR 1
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A VR puzzle game with sci-fi and escape room elements: control time, solve challenges, fight enemies, and explore worlds across different timelines.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A VR puzzle game with sci-fi and escape room elements: control time, solve challenges, fight enemies, and explore worlds across different timelines.
